mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_SENDTIME FROM MESSAGE ORDER BY MESSAGE_SENDTIME DESC
SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_SENDTIME, MESSAGE_READTIME, MESSAGE_READVAL FROM MESSAGE ORDER BY MESSAGE_SENDTIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_SUBJECT, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_SENDTIME) VALUES (#{MESSAGE_SENDER}, #{MESSAGE_RECEIVER}, #{MESSAGE_SUBJECT}, #{MESSAGE_CONTENT}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE MESSAGE SET MESSAGE_READVAL = true, MESSAGE_READTIME = now() WHERE MESSAGE_NO = #{MESSAGE_NO}
